Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/2013, off Matt Harrison (TEX)...
Won Gold Glove at Third Base in 2013...
Traded from Toronto to Detroit on 5/10/2015 (Going to DET: 2B Brett Lawrie. Going to TOR: P Tom Widdle, P Jeff Ferrell, P Joseph Dowdle)...
Injured on 6/29/2015 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
1/30/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,371,429 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
1/30/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,371,429 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2017, hitting .480 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
0/0/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,178,571 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Detroit to Oakland on 3/2/2018 (Going to DET: CF Anthony Gose, P Hector Ramirez. Going to OAK: 3B Brett Lawrie)...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/11/2019 to a 3-year deal worth $5,030,000 per year...
Injured on 8/31/2019 with a Broken Foot, out for 7 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2020, hitting .563 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/9/2022 to a 4-year deal worth $8,000,500 per year...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against New York (A) on 6/9/2023...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against New York (A) on 6/9/2023...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2023, hitting .600 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/10/2026 to a 3-year deal worth $12,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2026 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/22/2026, off Braden Shipley (CHW)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2026, hitting .394 with 10 HR, 36 RBI...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 5/19/2028...
8/1/2028: Signed a contract extension with Minnesota, $1,790,000 per year, for 1 years.
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/8/2029 to a 1-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
